title: Ticket #7486: Starter should report number of files in the sandbox
description:
In addition to reporting on DiskUsage of the job (the amount of disk used by the job in the execute scratch dir). The number of files and directories in the scratch dir should be reported.

We want this so that it is possibly to to write STARTD policy expressions to evict jobs that create an excessive number of files.

A new job attribute ScratchDirFileCount will be produced by the STARTER when it scans for DiskUsage. It will contain the sum of files and directories that it finds when it does the scan for disk usage.

This attribute will be sent to the SHADOW and also to the STARTD where it will be incorporated into the slot ad because ScratchDirFileCount will be added to SYSTEM_STARTD_JOB_ATTRS
